ğŸŸ¢ THE PROBLEM THAT THE TABFLOW EXT. TACKLES ğŸŸ¢

Has it happened to you that you start opening tabs in your browser and invariably, there comes a time when you have so many tabs opened in a single browser window, that everything becomes a hectic mess? Becauseâ€¦1. Each tab becomes extremely small, 2. It's hard to tell which tab is which, 3. It's aesthetically unpleasing, 4. it's a disorder, 5. It's confusing 6. On many occasions one has needed to forcefully close tabs or whole browser windows, losing important information; to be able to reduce the tab clutter and overloadâ€¦ and more.

ğŸŸ¢ HOW DOES THE TABFLOW EXT. SOLVES THIS PROBLEM? ğŸŸ¢

When you have reached the tab limit that you have set for that specific window of your browser. What the TabFlow extension will do is that the next tab that you open, it will automatically be opened in a new browsing window. 

By doing this, it enables you to avoid the tab overload headache of having too many
tabs in the same internet window :).

ğŸ”¹ğŸ”¸ FEATURES ğŸ”¸ğŸ”¹

ğŸ”¹ WINDOW TRANSITION ARROWS:

âœ… The Transition Arrows work like a carousel, so you will eventually get to the browser window you are looking for.


ğŸ”¸ TAB LIMIT FOR THIS WINDOW:

Each window has the number of tabs limit stated in the â€œTab Limit for this Windowâ€
numerical rectangle. The user can update the tab limit for that particular window and any other browser window that they have opened.

âœ… The user CAN INCREASE THE TAB LIMIT FOR A PARTICULAR WINDOW. As an
example, the user can change the tab limit of a window. From their current 8 tabs to a tab limit of 13 tabs.

âœ… The user CAN CHANGE TO A LOWER TAB LIMIT FOR ANY PARTICULAR
WINDOW. As long as they close enough tabs, to the point where they have equal or
fewer tabs opened in that window than the new lower limit that they want to set in that window.

An example of this would beâ€¦ if you have 12 tabs as your tab limit, for that particular window. And you want to change that limit to be for 10 tabs. Then you have to close enough tabs to have 10 or fewer tabs opened in that specific window, if you want to proceed to make this reduced tab limit adjustment, for that internet window.

ğŸ”¹ SETTINGS:

âœ… FIRST WINDOW TAB LIMIT: You are setting your preferred tab limit for the first
window when you open the first window of a new browsing batch.

Note: The Tab Limit range is between 7 to 18 tabs for all browsing windows. The default number of tab limits for a browsing window that we think works well is eight (8) tabs, but you can change it, as you see fit and based on your preferences.

ğŸ”¸ MODE:

âœ… You can set the extension in either light or dark mode. The mode that you set, will become your predetermine, but you can change it at any time.

ğŸ”¹ SHARE:

âœ… We have an inbuilt sharing feature inside the TabFlow extension. So you can easily save your friends and everyone else. From the tab overload headache, in their internet windows!
